definition: completing its life cycle within a year, a reference book that is published regularly once every year
details:
adjective
- completing its life cycle within a year
= example: completing its life cycle within a year
= synonyms: one-year
- occurring or payable every year
= example: occurring or payable every year
= synonyms: yearly
noun
- a reference book that is published regularly once every year
= synonyms: yearly
- (botany) a plant that completes its entire life cycle within the space of a year
